scripts.compose: npm run clean-compose && webpack --config config/wp-compose.js  && npm run test-compose
scripts.dev-website: npm run clean-compose && npm run clean-website && webpack --config config/wp-webpage.js --watch
scripts.dev-compose: npm run clean-compose && webpack --config config/wp-compose.js --watch && npm run test-compose
scripts.clean: npm run clean-compose && npm run clean-discord
